00014 // definition of SpikeListMean class
00015 // computes the average (over time) firing rate of a spike train between t_start and t_stop
00016 // the spike trains are of type std::deque<Time>
00018 
00019 class SpikeListMean
00020 {
00021 public:
00022     double operator() (const std::deque<Time> & spike_train, const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop)
00023     {
00024         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator i = spike_train.begin();
00025         for ( ; i != spike_train.end();
00026              ++i)
00027             if ((*i) >= t_start) break;
00028         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator j = i;
00029         for ( ; j != spike_train.end();
00030              ++j)
00031             if ((*j) > t_stop) break;
00032         return (((double)(j-i)) / (t_stop - t_start));
00033     }
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00037 
00039 // definition of SpikeListCorrel class
00040 // computes the correlation (over time) between 2 spike trains for all puls pairs between t_start and t_stop
00041 // the spike trains are of type std::deque<Time>
00042 // KernelFunction is a function with (const Time &, const Time &) in argument that returns a double
00044 
00045 template <class KernelFunction>
00046 class SpikeListCorrel
00047 {
00048 public:
00049     double operator() (const std::deque<Time> & spike_train1, const std::deque<Time> & spike_train2, const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop)
00050     {
00051         double res = 0.;
00052 
00053         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator i1 = spike_train1.begin();
00054         for ( ; i1 != spike_train1.end(); ++i1)
00055             if ((*i1) >= t_start) break;
00056         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator i2 = spike_train2.begin();
00057         for ( ; i2 != spike_train2.end(); ++i2)
00058             if ((*i2) >= t_start) break;
00059         if (i2 == spike_train2.end()) return res; // no significant spike in spike_train2
00060 
00061         for ( ; i1 != spike_train1.end(); ++i1)
00062         {
00063             if ((*i1) >= t_stop) break;
00064             for ( ; i2 != spike_train2.begin(); --i2)
00065             {
00066                 if (i2 != spike_train2.end())
00067                     if (((*i2) < (*i1) - KernelFunction::cutoff_left) || ((*i2) < t_start))
00068                     {
00069                         ++i2;
00070                         break;
00071                     }
00072             }
00073             for ( ; i2 != spike_train2.end(); ++i2)
00074             {
00075                 if (((*i2) < (*i1) + KernelFunction::cutoff_right) && ((*i2) < t_stop))
00076                     res += kf_(*i1, *i2);
00077                 else
00078                     break;
00079             }
00080         }
00081         return res / (t_stop - t_start)
00082             - KernelFunction::mass * slm_(spike_train1, t_start, t_stop) * slm_(spike_train2, t_start, t_stop);
00083     }
00084 protected:
00085     KernelFunction kf_;
00086     SpikeListMean slm_;
00087 };
00088 
00089 
00090 */
00091 
00092 #endif  //SPIKELISTPROCESSING_H
